42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4:
Daniel Radcliffe gains £20 million fortune at 18.
He insists the money won't change him, no plans for extravagant spending.
Radcliffe likes buying books, CDs, and DVDs, not luxury items.
He will have a party, but details are under wraps.
ee8871b15c50d0db17b0179a6d2beab35065f1e9:
CNN correspondent Soledad O'Brien visits the "forgotten floor" in Miami-Dade pretrial detention facility housing mentally ill inmates.
Most inmates on the floor face drug charges or assaulting an officer, often due to confrontations with police.
Judge Steven Leifman advocates for justice and mental health, seeking to change the system.
The facility is overcrowded, with one-third of county jail inmates mentally ill.
06352019a19ae31e527f37f7571c6dd7f0c5da37:
Drivers describe harrowing tales of survival after Minneapolis bridge collapse.
Survivor Gary Babineau had a 30- to 35-foot free fall into the Mississippi River.
Dr. John Hink rushed to the scene in 15 minutes, helping rescue 55 people.
Rescue effort was controlled and organized, with volunteers and EMTs working feverishly.
24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88:
Doctors removed five small polyps from President Bush's colon.
The polyps were less than a centimeter in diameter and appeared non-worrisome.
Bush is in good humor and will resume activities at Camp David.
He spoke to Laura Bush before and after the procedure.
7fe70cc8b12fab2d0a258fababf7d9c6b5e1262a:
NFL suspends Michael Vick without pay.
Vick pleads guilty to federal charges related to dogfighting.
Falcons owner Arthur Blank calls Vick's actions "incomprehensible and unacceptable."
